Structure# Schema.Version

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 10.0+Swift 5.9+

```
struct Version
```

## [Topics](/documentation/SwiftData/Schema/Version-swift.struct#topics)

### [Operators](/documentation/SwiftData/Schema/Version-swift.struct#Operators)

[`static func == (Schema.Version, Schema.Version) -> Bool`](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/version-swift.struct/==(_:_:))Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.[`static func < (Schema.Version, Schema.Version) -> Bool`](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/version-swift.struct/_(_:_:))Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the value of the first argument is less than that of the second argument.### [Initializers](/documentation/SwiftData/Schema/Version-swift.struct#Initializers)

[`init(Int, Int, Int)`](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/version-swift.struct/init(_:_:_:))Initializes a version struct with the provided components of a semantic version.### [Instance Properties](/documentation/SwiftData/Schema/Version-swift.struct#Instance-Properties)

[`var description: String`](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/version-swift.struct/description)A textual description of the version object.[`let major: Int`](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/version-swift.struct/major)The major version according to the semantic versioning standard.[`let minor: Int`](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/version-swift.struct/minor)The minor version according to the semantic versioning standard.[`let patch: Int`](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/version-swift.struct/patch)The patch version according to the semantic versioning standard.## [Relationships](/documentation/SwiftData/Schema/Version-swift.struct#relationships)
